parameters.content:
# Subscribe Workflow
#### It will take the data from the frontend as soon as user hit the subscribe button and then it will update the data in the google sheets.

parameters.text:
=You are an AI agent that summarizes job listings per user.

For the following job listings, generate a concise summary using this structure for each:

- **Job Title**: ...
- **Company**: ...
- **Location**: ...
- **Salary**: ...
- **Experience Required**: ...
- **Skills**: ...
- **Short Description**: ...
- **Job URL**: ...

{{ $json.jobFormatted }}

Give Email at the end:
{{ $json.email }}

parameters.subject: Job Listing Summary from Job Finder

nodes.name: Filter Jobs according to user's preferences for keyword and location
Further Filtering and handling edge cases
Extract email and summary from the output
Takes data from the excel and convert it to the prefinal format
Convert the markdown format to the HTML format so as to send it to the gmail account
Delete rows or columns from sheet

parameters.subject: Unsubscribed from Job Finder
parameters.message:
=

Hello,

Weâ€™ve successfully removed your email address from our job alert subscription list. You will no longer receive job updates from us.

If this was a mistake or you change your mind in the future, you're always welcome to re-subscribe.

Thank you,
The Job Finder Team

This is an automated message. Please do not reply to this email.

nodes.name: Append or update row in sheet
